title: Accidental shooting send man to OKC hospital
content:
DICKSON, Okla. (KXII) -- A man was airlifted to an Oklahoma City hospital after he was shot in the calf, accidentally
The accidental shooting happened around 5 a.m. XXX near Sparrow and Dickson streets.
Dickson Police said Javier Casas, 25,was holding his friend's .270 bolt action deer rifle, and when his friend tried to take the gun away from Casas the gun went off and the bullet hit Casas in the right calf.
Police say the two were intoxicated and no charges will be filed.
Casas is expected to be okay.
